languages.text: "Вот как". {n}Нахмурившись, Пощада обменивается взглядами с остальными. Будто прочитав ответ в их стеклянных глазах, он качает головой.{/n} "Может ли круг решить так? Ведь приговор Фалько был изречен не нашими устами, но одними лишь твоими. Значит ли это, что теперь ты говоришь за нас и вместо нас? Вопрос опасный".

"Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."
languages.original_text: "Вот как". {n}Нахмурившись, Пощада обменивается взглядами с остальными. Будто прочитав ответ в их стеклянных глазах, он качает головой.{/n} "Может ли круг решить так? Ведь приговор Фалько был изречен не нашими устами, но одними лишь твоими. Значит ли это, что теперь ты говоришь за нас и вместо нас? Вопрос опасный".

Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

languages.text: “是这样吗？”{n}悯慈皱起了眉头，与其他冷市商人交换着眼神。随后，他仿佛从那些人呆滞的目光中看到了某种答案。他摇了摇头。{/n}“各位能同意吗？毕竟，关于法尔科的判决并不是由我们做的，而是由你一个人做的。这是否意味着你打算替我们行使职责？这恐怕是个危险的提案。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: “是这样吗？”{n}悯慈皱起了眉头，与其他冷市商人交换着眼神。随后，他仿佛从那些人呆滞的目光中看到了某种答案。他摇了摇头。{/n}“各位能同意吗？毕竟，关于法尔科的判决并不是由我们做的，而是由你一个人做的。这是否意味着你打算替我们行使职责？这恐怕是个危险的提案。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「そうなのか？」{n} 顔をしかめたマーシーは、他のコールド・トレーダーたちと顔を見合わせた。そのガラスのような瞳に何か答えを読み取るかのように、彼は首を横に振った。{/n}「会合は、それに同意できるのか？結局のところ、ファルコの判決は我々によって下されたのではなく、あなた一人によって下されたのです。我々の代わりに、あなたが代弁すると？危険な提案だ」
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: 「そうなのか？」{n} 顔をしかめたマーシーは、他のコールド・トレーダーたちと顔を見合わせた。そのガラスのような瞳に何か答えを読み取るかのように、彼は首を横に振った。{/n}「会合は、それに同意できるのか？結局のところ、ファルコの判決は我々によって下されたのではなく、あなた一人によって下されたのです。我々の代わりに、あなたが代弁すると？危険な提案だ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí?». {n}Mercy frunce el ceño e intercambia miradas con los otros Comerciantes Fríos. Como si leyera una respuesta en sus ojos vidriosos, niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¿Está de acuerdo el círculo? A fin de cuentas, la sentencia de Falco no la dictamos nosotros, sino tú. ¿Significa eso que hablas por nosotros y en lugar de nosotros? Es una propuesta peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí?». {n}Mercy frunce el ceño e intercambia miradas con los otros Comerciantes Fríos. Como si leyera una respuesta en sus ojos vidriosos, niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¿Está de acuerdo el círculo? A fin de cuentas, la sentencia de Falco no la dictamos nosotros, sino tú. ¿Significa eso que hablas por nosotros y en lugar de nosotros? Es una propuesta peligrosa».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Ah oui ? » {n}Mercy fronce les sourcils et échange un regard avec les autres marchands. Comme s'il lisait une réponse dans leurs yeux vitreux, il secoue la tête.{/n} « Le cercle peut-il l'accepter ? Après tout, ce n'est pas nous qui avons prononcé la sentence de Falco, mais toi et toi seule. Cela veut-il dire que tu t'exprimes aujourd'hui en notre nom à tous et à notre place ? Cette proposition me paraît dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: « Ah oui ? » {n}Mercy fronce les sourcils et échange un regard avec les autres marchands. Comme s'il lisait une réponse dans leurs yeux vitreux, il secoue la tête.{/n} « Le cercle peut-il l'accepter ? Après tout, ce n'est pas nous qui avons prononcé la sentence de Falco, mais toi et toi seule. Cela veut-il dire que tu t'exprimes aujourd'hui en notre nom à tous et à notre place ? Cette proposition me paraît dangereuse. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Stirnrunzelnd tauscht Mercy Blicke mit den anderen Kalthändlern. Er schüttelt den Kopf, als ob er ihren glasigen Augen eine Art Antwort ablesen könnte.{/n} "Kann der Kreis dem zustimmen? Schließlich wurde Falcos Urteil nicht durch uns verhängt, sondern von Euch allein. Bedeutet das, dass Ihr an der Stelle für uns und an unserer Stelle sprecht? Ein gefährlicher Vorschlag."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Stirnrunzelnd tauscht Mercy Blicke mit den anderen Kalthändlern. Er schüttelt den Kopf, als ob er ihren glasigen Augen eine Art Antwort ablesen könnte.{/n} "Kann der Kreis dem zustimmen? Schließlich wurde Falcos Urteil nicht durch uns verhängt, sondern von Euch allein. Bedeutet das, dass Ihr an der Stelle für uns und an unserer Stelle sprecht? Ein gefährlicher Vorschlag."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Merhamet, kaşlarını çatarak diğer Soğuk Tacirlerle bakışıyor. Onların cam gibi gözlerinde bir çeşit yanıt okumuş gibi başını sallıyor.{/n} "Grup bunu onaylayabilir mi? Nihayetinde Falco'nun cezasını kesen biz değildik, bunu sen kendi başına yaptın. Bu da artık bizim için ve bizim yerimize konuştuğun anlamına mı geliyor? Tehlikeli bir önerme."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Frowning, Mercy exchanges a look with the other Cold Traders. As though reading some kind of answer in their glassy eyes, he shakes his head.{/n} "Can the circle agree to that? After all, Falco's sentence was not handed down by us, but by you alone. Does that mean that now you speak for us and instead of us? A dangerous proposition."

traits.locale_text: "Demek öyle?" {n}Merhamet kaşlarını çatarak diğer Soğuk Tacirlerle bakışıyor. Onların cam gibi gözlerinde bir çeşit yanıt okumuş gibi başını sallıyor.{/n} "Grup bunu onaylayabilir mi? Nihayetinde Falco'nun cezasını kesen biz değildik, bunu sen kendi başına yaptın. Bu da artık bizim için ve bizim yerimize konuştuğun anlamına mı geliyor? Tehlikeli bir önerme."
traits.speaker: Mercy
